text_block_list.text:
One evening, as I was passing through 
the shopping district…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm getting the feeling of a big
commotion!! A.K.A., a feeling that the
class president is going to be playing a
very active part!!

text_block_list.name: Market Person
text_block_list.text:
Come, now, it's time for the New Year's
Huge Lucky Draw Festival! The special
prize is a hot spring trip ticket!

text_block_list.name: Market Person
text_block_list.text:
First prize is a "special carrot
hamburger steak," second prize is a
"pile of carrots," and third prize is
a "carrot"!

text_block_list.name: Market Person
text_block_list.text:
You two look close! Why don't you go
ahead and give it a try～?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What's this, a lucky draw―! Then,
there's no problem with all the fuss!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! 
Actually, I have one of those lucky draw 
tickets!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
One of my classmates said, "Bakushin 
O-chan seems like she would like this," 
and so she gave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
"I can just see myself spinning that
lottery wheel now"…was the assessment I
gave her!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This is a typical example of me being 
recognized as the class president 
on a daily basis!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So let's get to it and try our hand
at the Lucky Draw!! We only have one
chance!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Of course, we're aiming for!! 
All the prizes!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well, then at least one special prize, I 
suppose. 
There's no way I won't get it, though!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Because, as you can see, I'm a very good 
girl! There's no way the God of Fortune 
would abandon me in my time of need!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Come!! Now is the time!!!! For God to 
endlessly adore the class president! 
To this exemplary class president right 
here――
choice_data_list: Hurry up and spin it already!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Very well!! 
Here we go! Bakushin!!

While trying to calm Sakura Bakushin O,
who was wildly running about trying to
spin the machine, I held the lever and
managed to spin the lottery together
with her.
The results were――

text_block_list.name: Market Person
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'll be! Coooongratulations!! The
special prize, a ticket for a trip to
the hot springs, has been claimed～～
～～!!
We got "<itemname>".

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ohhhh～!! 
The Special Prize!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And, and!? 
Aren't the other balls supposed to be 
popping out too!?
choice_data_list: The special prize alone is fantastic!
The special prize alone is fantastic!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fufufuu―, 
that's true, too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As expected, the class president is
the one who's the very best at lottery
drawings―!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Indeed!! After all, they say luck tends
to suit the superior!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Just as I thought, it seems even the
lottery balls want to follow me, what
with my sheer charisma～.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
When I think about it, I feel like
somehow these balls are starting to look
kind of cute…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! Can I keep this ball in my
room!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ha-ha～! It's a joke! I possess a
superior sense of humor, too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now, then, 
I shall give this ticket to Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I still have a lot of work 
to do as class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I don't have time! to soak in some nice, 
relaxing, leisurely hot spring… I don't! 
I don't have time to be submerged in 
pure relaxation!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
When the world is so exemplary that it
no longer needs a class president, let
us go to that hot spring.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I trust the Trainer's reliable 
eyes, so!! Please!

…I'm not sure what that means, but I
was supposed to keep the special prize
ticket.

text_block_list.name: Market Person
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations, first prize～! The
prize is a "Special Carrot Hamburger"!
We got "<itemname>".

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ohh! Amazing! 
Extra special, first class plus!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of special, even going to an
eel restaurant couldn't possibly compare
to the top-class quality of this prize
hamburger! This is precisely a hamburger
intended for the class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The class president and the hamburger 
made for the class president. 
Once these two come together, what comes 
next is――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――just eating it!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and of course, I'll share it 
with Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Because the class motto for this month
is! "Cherish a thoughtful heart."

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The class president, the hamburger made 
for the class president, and the Trainer 
watching over me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If I have that much, I'm absolutely sure
I could eat an extra special hamburger,
with exemplary-ness!

After that, I enjoyed the extra special
taste of Sakura Bakushin O's kindness
together with her.

text_block_list.name: Market Person
text_block_list.text:
Second prize～!! 
The prize is a "mountain of carrots"!
We got "<itemname>".

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
A mountain of them!! 
Mmm, that sounds great!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: After all, more is always better!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
However, with such a large amount of
food, I worry how I could possibly eat
it all～.
choice_data_list: Why don't you try cooking it?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Haaaaaaah!? 
So that's what this was about～～～～!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Food tastes better when it's cooked,
right!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In other words, this heaping pile of
carrots is just waiting for me to lead
them to deliciousness!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Leave it to me! This Sakura Bakushin O 
right here shall bestow upon you the 
class president's wondrous existence!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
All of you!! I'll make sure you graduate 
as delicious carrooots～～!!

……I'm kind of nervous about this, so I 
decided to help her whenever she ends up 
cooking.

text_block_list.name: Market Person
text_block_list.text:
Third prize～! 
The prize is "one carrot"!
We got "<itemname>".

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Uuuuu―ghhh…… 
One single carrot, huh.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ha!? Isn't it possible that there's 
something important hidden inside 
this singular carrot!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It really is just one carrot… Truly, 
it isn't symbolic of anything!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hmm! If you look closely at this carrot,
you'll see a shape in it that doesn't
make any sense!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Just as I thought, the item bestowed 
upon the class president can't be just 
a mere carrot…!
choice_data_list: …Did you watch any detective dramas yesterday?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What do you mean!? 
A great detective is always close by!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If that's the case, then it's up to
the president detective and the Trainer
detective to compete over this one
carrot!!

On the way home, Sakura Bakushin O and 
I had a great discussion about the 
true meaning of a carrot…

text_block_list.name: Market Person
text_block_list.text:
Too bad, you lost! 
The participation prize is a tissue～!
We got "<itemname>".

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Shoooock…! A, a tissue…! 
And it's just a participation prize!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
… N, no! There's no way I was only given 
a mere tissue!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In other words, this must be―― a "You
Did Your Best Award"!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In the childhood quiz competitions, 
marathons, and other competitions that I 
have challenged as class president…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I received many tissues! 
As an accompaniment to my proud "You 
Did Your Best Award"!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So therefore, this tissue is also a good 
thing――a good…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No, it's just… Did you also have that 
"Shoooock!" feeling when you got those 
tissues?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But, I'm the only one who got the "You
Did Your Best Award"…… W, what? The
other kids got one too…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No, no, that can't be…? 
Ehhhhhh～……? H～nnnnn…?

Sakura Bakushin O experienced a 
depressing feeling that could not be 
put into words…
